title: Burn Like Fire
description: Lexi and her friends head to Ohio after Anna gets a tip about her mom's killer. While they're there, they learn that her mom was involved in something that surprises them all. Meanwhile, Rhonda struggles with her own inner demons and comes to find that playing with peoples emotions isn't always easy. Austin and Anna's relationship will soon be put to the test. While Austin wants Anna to become a vampire more than ever before, she's not so sure...
author: Jayme Morse
